Magnetic Messaging is a texting guide that covers essentially everything about texting and phone-related messaging when wooing a woman. Magnetic Messaging is available as a downloadable eBook and is a collaborative effort of two pickup experts and dating gurus Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Bobby Rio and Rob.

The guide offers the tools and techniques that you can apply so as to communicate more elaborately with women using text messaging. The result is that more women will be more excited and willing to meet with you. The guide is really detailed, covering a range of situations with women such as when youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve never gone out with her, when youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve gone out with her but nothing more than that, and when you are already in a relationship with her.

The guide focuses on teaching you to craft text messages that will yield one of these outcomes: set her emotions raging, build a connection, or deal with logistics. The guide expounds on how and when to approach each one of these goals.
